description: As more Singaporeans are being diagnosed with dementia, more community support is needed for them and their caregivers. Meet the people who are banding together to build dementia-friendly facilities and support systems in Singapore.
title: Living outside with dementia: How Singapore builds its dementia-friendly neighbourhoods
title_page: Living outside with dementia: How Singapore builds its dementia-friendly neighbourhoods | The Straits Times
